|flash1type = SPI NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD5F1GQ5UEYIG; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR |ram1type1 = SIP |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Allwinner;F1C200s;onchip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''MangoPi-R3 Ver:C'', ''MANGOPI'', and ''20211031'' are silkscreened on the board top. ''mangopi.org'' is silkscreened on the board bottom.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' F1C200s @420MHz (ARM926EJS) *Memory: 64MB DDR SIP RAM *Storage: 128MB SPI NAND Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *USB: 1x Micro USB OTG port *Power: 5V via Micro USB port
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/02/03/more-allwinner-f1c200s-arm9-boards-mangopi-r3-and-cherrypi-f1c200s/ ''More Allwinner F1C200s ARM9 boards: MangoPi R3 and CherryPi-F1C200S'' on '''CNX-Software''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:MangoPi-R3 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:MangoPi-R3 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
